document.full_text: long before j.k. rowling turned harry potter into a publishing phenomenon, another female author, jean auel, was launching her own bestselling series set in prehistory which concludes on tuesday with the sixth book.
document.title: jean auel concludes prehistoric saga with 6th book
lines_and_colors: long before j.k. rowling turned harry potter into a publishing phenomenon, another female author, jean auel, was launching her own bestselling series set in prehistory which concludes on tuesday with the sixth book.
